__e: 8. When someone says he/she will call back at a specific time - but doesn't, how do you feel?
I knew you'd call me back.
My brother's the only man alive can call me an idiot.
I believe when I left, you were calling me an idiot.
He'll never be able to call me a ding-a-ling again.
- And if he "pops" me once more, I'll pop him right back.
Well, you may call me "dear,' but you shouldn't say good night.

maybe we should call dr. jeff.
